episodes.title: Bible vs Watchtower - Understanding The Image In Nebuchadnezzar's Dream (Part 1 of 6 Bible Prophecy)
episodes.description: Is the Bible inspired by God? This is part 1 of a 6 part series. Are its prophecies true and accurate? Because of the Watchtower's inaccurate interpretation of Bible prophecy, and for other reasons as well, quite a few ex-JW's seriously doubt the inspiration of the Bible and the accuracy of Bible prophecies. In this video I show Biblically and historically what the Image of Daniel chapter 2 reveals. I also share a few reasons why I believe the Bible is truly inspired by God. This is a simplified overview of Daniel chapter 2.

episodes.title: Has There Always Been A Governing Body?
episodes.description:
Anthony Morris was the chairman of the 2020 Annual Meeting of Jehovah's Witnesses Part 1. In this video we will examine his teachings about the governing body as compared to what the Bible teaches.

Link to meeting
https://www.jw.org/en/library/videos/#en/mediaitems/StudioFeatured/pub-jwb_202101_1_VIDEO

episodes.title: Jesus, The Literal Only-Begotten Son Of God!
episodes.description:
This video is a "must see" not only for Jehovah's Witnesses, but for those who believe in the trinity doctrine as well! You will see from the Bible that God is NOT a trinity, that Jesus is not "co-equal" nor is He "co-eternal" with the Father. However, He does share an equality with the Father. You will see clear Biblical proof that Jesus is in fact the Divine Son of God, NOT created but begotten.

This is a vital point which most Christians, whether Catholic or Protestant including Jehovah's Witnesses, Mormons and Seventh Day Adventists misunderstand.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
